page.title: 11TRANSPORT IN MILLAND
page.content: liphook station on the main railway line from london to portsmouth must be the focus of transport as many residents work in london, guildford or portsmouth using the railway to commute. to get to the station people use their private cars, and cars are the main means of transport in the area for shopping, visiting, etc. there is a very scanty bus service between midhurst and petersfield passing through the area and a daily bus run by the education department picking up the school children for midhurst intermediate and grammar schools. the one trunk road in the area is the london to portsmouth(A3) which carries much heavy traffic; all the other roads are minor, some no more than lanes. there is a taxi service.
